dosing_details: Subjects were instructed to abstain from caffeine containing foods and beverages for 24h prior to and during the study. Caffeine (5mg/kg) was administered orally as a solution of caffeine citrate in 5 subjects (and salvia and plasma sampled). Only salvia was sampled in the other 21 subjects, who were allowed to select 180ml of coffee (n=18), tea (n=2) or cola (n=1). Salvia was sampled 8 times over a 24h period.
